title: Crystal Palace FC Team News, Fixtures & Results 2023/2024 | Premier League
description: For the latest news on Crystal Palace FC, including scores, fixtures, team news, results, form guide & league position, visit the official website of the Premier League.
cleaned_text: Crystal Palace Selhurst Park, London Est: 1905 Browse the official Crystal Palace shop for all the latest offers now, as well as the eye-catching 23/24 kits! Manish Bhasin, Leon Osman and Shay Given look back on the summer and discuss which clubs strengthened the most
